Mar 13, 2010

Today I saw in the Internet an especial movie for ...

Today I saw in the Internet an especial movie for me and downloaded it. But I was discouraged by reason of it was corrupted,exactly was corrupted zip archive with movie inside. But by good fortune I found in the Google a next software - zip repairing. To my surprise the software solved my issues for seconds and free of charge as far as I kept in mind.
